pages.text: $(li)Nautilus are passive creatures that can be found underwater caves and ravines, except in cold or frozen oceans.$(br)$(li)When a Drowned, Squid or you are near of one of these creatures or if they are hit, they will perform a few dashes to escape.
Nautilis may drop a Nautilus Shell on death.
$(li)They are immune to buble columns and are unaffected by their pull.$(br)$(li)You can capture these creatures with Buckets, if you release one from this Bucket, it will not despawn.
